Author: None
Text: {Cue lion roar in the background, calling the animals to gather to Pride Rock for the Ceremony.}

Author: None
Text: [ MS: Male Singer BS: Background Singer FS: Female Singer ]

Author: None
Text: {Sunrise on African grassland , in time with opening chant to The Circle of Life}

Author: MS
Text: Nants ingonyama bagithi Baba

Author: BS
Text: Sithi uhm ingonyama

Author: None
Text: {Various shots of animals raising their heads at the sunrise: rhinos, antelope, a cheetah, meerkats, storks...}

Author: MS
Text: Nants ingonyama bagithi Baba

Author: BS
Text: Sithi uhhmm ingonyama

Author: None
Text: Ingonyama

Author: MS
Text: Siyo Nqoba

Author: BS
Text: Ingonyama Ingonyama nengw' enamabala

Author: None
Text: Ingonyama nengw' enamabala Ingonyama nengw' enamabala

Author: None
Text: {The Circle of Life ground forms in the BS's and holds its pattern for eight bars. It is a non-chordal BS part. The progressions are in the medium ranges of the strings. Various pans and camera views of African animals, all moving. Coinciding with the FS pickup in the eighth bar, we first view the giraffes, panning to a long shot of all the animals in their procession}

Author: FS
Text: From the day we arrive on the planet And, blinking, step into the sun There's more to see than can ever be seen More to do than can ever be done

Author: None
Text: {Camera is panning and jumping to elephants, zebras, ants, birds, storks, etc... }

Author: None
Text: There's far too much to take in here More to find than can ever be found But the sun rolling high Through the sapphire sky Keeps great and small on the endless round

Author: None
Text: {When the "The Circle of Life" is mentioned the long- distance pan centers on Pride Rock where all the animals are gathering. Mufasa is on Pride Rock. Long camera arc to Mufasa and Zazu.}

Author: None
Text: It's the Circle of Life And it moves us all

Author: None
Text: Through despair and hope Through faith and love

Author: None
Text: {Appearance of Rafiki, the mandrill. He passes between ranks of animals, who bow to him; he then climbs Pride Rock to where Mufasa is standing.}

Author: None
Text: Till we find our place On the path unwinding

Author: None
Text: In the Circle The Circle of Life

Author: None
Text: {Decrescendo in BS. FS drops out. Pan Flute takes simple lead.}

Author: None
Text: {Rafiki puts the juice and sand he collects on Simba's brow-- a ceremonial crown. He then picks Simba up and ascends to the point of Pride Rock. Mufasa and Sarabi follow. With a crescendo in the music and a restatement of the refrain, Rafiki holds Simba up for the crowd to view.}

Author: FS
Text: It's The Circle of Life

Author: None
Text: And it moves us all Through despair and hope Through faith and love

Author: None
Text: {The clouds part and a sunbeam highlights Rafiki and Simba on Pride Rock.}

Author: None
Text: Till we find our place

Author: None
Text: On the path unwinding

Author: None
Text: {Camera slowly zooms out to a striking panoramic view of the Presentation.}

Author: None
Text: In the Circle The Circle of Life

Author: None
Text: {Bass drum hit and immediate switch to black screen with title "The Lion King" in blood-red caps.}

Author: None
Text: {Mouse comes out and starts preening in the light. Begins sniffing. Becomes frightened. Suddenly a large lion paw swoops down and catches him.}

Author: None
Text: {Cue the Scar theme . Fade in slowly and up full during speech}

Author: None
Text: {Camera switch to Scar holding the squeaking and struggling mouse in his paw. He talks to it while playing with it}

Author: Scar
Text: Life's not fair, is it? You see I -- well, I... shall never be King. And you... shall never see the light of another day. {closed-mouth laughter. Starts to place the mouse on his extended tongue} ... Adieu...

Author: None
Text: Zazu : Didn't your mother ever tell you not to play with your food?

Author: Scar
Text: What do you want?

Author: Zazu
Text: I'm here to announce that King Mufasa is on his way. ...So you'd better have a good excuse for missing the ceremony this morning.

Author: Scar
Text: Oh now look, Zazu; you've made me lose my lunch.

Author: Zazu
Text: Hah! You'll lose more than that when the King gets through with you. He's as mad as a hippo with a hernia.

Author: Scar
Text: Oooh... I quiver with FEAR.

Author: None
Text: {On "FEAR" Scar crouches down and is baring his teeth at Zazu.}

Author: Zazu
Text: Now Scar, don't look at me that way... HELP!

Author: Mufasa
Text: Scar! ...

Author: Scar
Text: Mm-hmm?

Author: Mufasa
Text: Drop him.

Author: Zazu
Text: Impeccable timing, your majesty.

Author: Zazu
Text: Eyyccch.

Author: Scar
Text: Why! If it isn't my big brother descending from on high to mingle with the commoners.

Author: Mufasa
Text: Sarabi and I didn't see you at the presentation of Simba.

Author: Scar
Text: That was today? Oh, I feel simply awful.

Author: None
Text: {He turns and start scraping his claws on the rock wall. Zazu cringes at the sound.}

Author: Scar
Text: ...Must have slipped my mind.

Author: Zazu
Text: Yes, well, as slippery as your mind is, as the king's brother, you should have been first in line!

Author: None
Text: {Scar clicks his teeth at Zazu, who has flown near his face. Zazu takes cover behind Mufasa's foreleg. Scar bends down to speak to him.}

Author: Scar
Text: Well, I was first in line... until the little hairball was born.

Author: Mufasa
Text: That "hairball" is my son... and your future king.

Author: Scar
Text: Ohh, I shall practice my curtsy.

Author: Mufasa
Text: Don't turn your back on me, Scar.

Author: Scar
Text: Oh, no, Mufasa. Perhaps YOU shouldn't turn YOUR back on me.

Author: Mufasa
Text: {Roars and literally jumps in front of Scar, baring his teeth for the first time} Is that a challenge?

Author: Scar
Text: Temper, temper. I wouldn't dream of challenging you.

Author: Zazu
Text: Pity! Why not?

Author: Scar
Text: Well, as far as brains go, I got the lion's share. But, when it comes to brute strength ...I'm afraid I'm at the shallow end of the gene pool.

Author: Zazu
Text: There's one in every family, sire... Two in mine, actually. And they always manage to ruin special occasions.

Author: Mufasa
Text: What am I going to do with him?

Author: Zazu
Text: He'd make a very handsome throw rug.

Author: Mufasa
Text: Zazu!

Author: Zazu
Text: And just think! Whenever he gets dirty, you could take him out and BEAT him.

Author: None
Text: {Rise in music-- "This Land" track-- with theme stated in African flute, it broadens eventually with chorus and full orchestra. We see a rainstorm gently crossing the savannah. Multiplane camera approach to Rafiki's baobab tree. Camera switch to inside the tree. Rafiki is doing hand paintings on the wall. We see he is completing a lion cub.}

Author: Rafiki
Text: {Mutters to himself, in which the word "Simba" can be heard} Hmmm... Ah heh heh heh heh heh... {completing the ceremonial crown in the painting} Simba.

Author: None
Text: {Horns and brass close theme in a stately manner with a decrescendo. Fade to black keeping the painting of the cub as a crossover to the fade in of Pride Rock in early morning}

Author: None
Text: {Simba is seen coming out on the rock. He runs back into the cave and leaps over several of the lionesses, accidentally jumping on a few.}

Author: Simba
Text: Dad! Daad! Come on, Dad, we gotta go. Wake up!

Author: None
Text: Random Lioness: Oomph!

Author: Simba
Text: Sorry! ...Oop.

Author: Simba
Text: Dad? Daad. Dad, Dad, Dad, Dad, Dad, Dad, Dad, Dad--

Author: Sarabi
Text: Your son... is awake...

Author: Mufasa
Text: Before sunrise, he's YOUR son.

Author: Simba
Text: Dad? Daad! Come on, Dad! Daa-- Whoa!

Author: None
Text: {He loses his grip on Mufasa's ear, and slips and crashes into something off camera. He then comes running back on screen and butts Mufasa. Mufasa sleepily eyes his son.}

Author: Simba
Text: You promised!

Author: Mufasa
Text: Okay, okay. I'm up. I'm up.

Author: Simba
Text: Yeah!

Author: None
Text: {Mufasa yawns a well-recorded lion yawn. Mufasa and Sarabi follow Simba up to the top of Pride Rock. Simba rubs up against Sarabi; she nudges him ahead and stays behind. Departing shot of her, with a loving expression. The sunrise illuminates the top of Pride Rock impressively. Both Simba and Mufasa are on the point. Cue music.}

Author: Mufasa
Text: Look, Simba. Everything the light touches is our kingdom.

Author: Simba
Text: Wow.

Author: None
Text: {The camera revolves around them, during Mufasa's speech, from a reverse view to a frontal shot.}

Author: Mufasa
Text: A king's time as ruler rises and falls like the sun. One day, Simba, the sun will set on my time here, and will rise with you as the new king.

Author: Simba
Text: And this will all be mine?

Author: Mufasa
Text: Everything.

Author: Simba
Text: Everything the light touches. {Simba looks all around. He views the rip-rap canyon to the north} What about that shadowy place?

Author: Mufasa
Text: That's beyond our borders. You must never go there, Simba.

Author: Simba
Text: But I thought a king can do whatever he wants.

Author: Mufasa
Text: Oh, there's more to being king than... getting your way all the time.

Author: Simba
Text: There's more?

Author: Mufasa
Text: Simba...

Author: None
Text: {Camera switch. Mufasa and Simba are out walking on the savannah.}

Author: Mufasa
Text: Everything you see exists together, in a delicate balance. As king, you need to understand that balance, and respect all the creatures-- from the crawling ant to the leaping antelope.

Author: Simba
Text: But, Dad, don't we eat the antelope?

Author: Mufasa
Text: Yes, Simba, but let me explain. When we die, our bodies become the grass. And the antelope eat the grass. And so we are all connected in the great Circle of Life.

Author: Zazu
Text: Good morning, sire!

Author: Mufasa
Text: Good morning, Zazu.

Author: Zazu
Text: Checking in... with the morning report.

Author: Mufasa
Text: Fire away.

Author: Zazu
Text: Well! The buzz from the bees is that the leopards are in a bit of a spot...

Author: None
Text: {Zazu's speech will continue through without stop. Simba's and Mufasa's conversation is the focus.}

Author: Mufasa
Text: Oh, really?

Author: None
Text: {Simba, uninterested in Zazu, pounces at a grasshopper and misses}

Author: Zazu
Text: {Continuing, not noticing Mufasa's lack of enthusiasm} ... And the baboons are going ape over this. Of course, the giraffes are acting like they're above it all...

Author: Mufasa
Text: What are you doing, son?

Author: Simba
Text: Pouncing.

Author: Mufasa
Text: Let an old pro show you how it's done.

Author: Zazu
Text: ...The tick birds are pecking on the elephants. I told the elephants to forget it, but they can't...

Author: Mufasa
Text: Zazu, would you turn around?

Author: Zazu
Text: Yes, sire. The cheetahs are hard up, but I always say ...

Author: Mufasa
Text: Stay low to the ground.

Author: Zazu
Text: Cheetahs never prosper...

Author: Simba
Text: Okay, stay low to the ground, right... yeah...

Author: Zazu
Text: What going on?

Author: Mufasa
Text: A pouncing lesson.

Author: Zazu
Text: Oh very good. Pouncing. Pouncing!?! Oh no, sire, you can't be serious...

Author: Zazu
Text: Oh... this is so humiliating.

Author: Mufasa
Text: Try not to make a sound.

Author: Zazu
Text: What are you telling him, Mufasa? {Looking around uneasily-- Simba and Mufasa seem to have disappeared.} Mufasa? Simba?

Author: None
Text: {Simba does a full pounce leaving Zazu stunned on the ground}

Author: Mufasa
Text: Ha ha ha ha ha. That's very good. Ha ha ha...

Author: Gopher
Text: Zazu!

Author: Zazu
Text: Yes?

Author: Gopher
Text: Sir. News from the underground.

Author: Mufasa
Text: Now, this time--

Author: Zazu
Text: Sire! Hyenas! In the Pride Lands!

Author: Mufasa
Text: Zazu, take Simba home.

Author: Simba
Text: Oh, Dad, can't I come?

Author: Mufasa
Text: No, son.

Author: Simba
Text: I never get to go anywhere.

Author: Zazu
Text: Oh, young master, one day you will be king; then you can chase those slobbering mangy stupid poachers from dawn until dusk.

Author: None
Text: {They head off. Camera pulls back to wide view of savannah.}

Author: None
Text: {Camera change to Scar on his overhanging rock ledge. We see Scar pace once and kick an old bone off the edge.}

Author: Simba
Text: Hey Uncle Scar! Guess what!

Author: Scar
Text: I despise guessing games.

Author: Simba
Text: I'm going to be king of Pride Rock.

Author: Scar
Text: Oh goody.

Author: Simba
Text: My dad just showed me the whole kingdom; and I'm going to rule it all. Heh heh.

Author: Scar
Text: Yes. Well... forgive me for not leaping for joy. Bad back, you know.

Author: Simba
Text: Hey, Uncle Scar? When I'm king, what will that make you?

Author: Scar
Text: A monkey's uncle.

Author: Simba
Text: Heh heh. You're so weird.

Author: Scar
Text: You have NO idea. ...So, your father showed you the whole kingdom, did he?

Author: Simba
Text: Everything.

Author: Scar
Text: He didn't show you what's beyond that rise at the northern border...?

Author: Simba
Text: Well, no... he said I can't go there.

Author: Scar
Text: And he's absolutely right. It's far too dangerous. Only the bravest lions go there.

Author: Simba
Text: Well, I'm brave! What's out th--

Author: Scar
Text: No, I'm sorry, Simba, I just can't tell you.

Author: Simba
Text: Why not?

Author: Scar
Text: Simba, Simba, I'm only looking out for the well- being of my favorite nephew.

Author: Simba
Text: Yeah, right, I'm your only nephew.

Author: Scar
Text: All the more reason for me to be protective... An elephant graveyard is no place for a young prince... Oops!

Author: Simba
Text: An elephant what? Whoa.

Author: Scar
Text: Oh dear, I've said too much... Well, I suppose you'd have found sooner or later, you being SO clever and all... Oh, just do me one favor-- promise me you'll never visit that dreadful place.

Author: Simba
Text: No problem.

Author: Scar
Text: There's a good lad. You run along now and have fun. And remember... it's our little secret.

Author: None
Text: {Simba leaves the rock, Scar walks away with an evil smile. Menacing music.}

Author: None
Text: {Simba is running down the slope of the bottom part of Pride Rock. He runs down towards two lionesses (Sarabi and Sarafina). Sarafina is giving Nala a bath. Music is light, almost jazzy. Pan flute lead.}

Author: Simba
Text: Hey, Nala.

Author: Nala
Text: Hi, Simba.

Author: Simba
Text: Come on. I just heard about this great place.

Author: Nala
Text: Simba! I'm kind of in the middle of a bath.

Author: Sarabi
Text: And it's time for yours.

Author: None
Text: {Simba tries to escape; Sarabi bends down and grabs him. She proceeds to give the struggling cub a bath.}

Author: Simba
Text: Mom! ...Mom. You're messing up my mane.

Author: Simba
Text: Okay, okay, I'm clean. Can we go now?

Author: Nala
Text: So where are we going? It better not be anyplace dumb.

Author: Simba
Text: No. It's really cool.

Author: Sarabi
Text: So where is this "really cool" place?

Author: Simba
Text: Oh. Uh... around the water hole.

Author: Nala
Text: The water hole? What's so great about the water hole?

Author: Simba
Text: I'll SHOW you when we GET there.

Author: Nala
Text: Oh. Uh... Mom, can I go with Simba?

Author: Sarafina
Text: Hmm... What do you think, Sarabi?

Author: Sarabi
Text: Well...

Author: None
Text: Nala and Simba: Pleeeease?

Author: Sarabi
Text: It's all right with me...

Author: Nala
Text: All right! Simba: Yeah!

Author: Sarabi
Text: ...As long as Zazu goes with you.

Author: Simba
Text: No. Not Zazu.

Author: None
Text: {Camera is at a ground angle slightly behind the cubs walking towards the water hole. Zazu is visible in the sky overhead.}

Author: Zazu
Text: Step lively. The sooner we get to the water hole, the sooner we can leave.

Author: None
Text: {Camera angle changes to the cubs from an immediate real view}

Author: Nala
Text: So where we really going?

Author: Simba
Text: An elephant graveyard.

Author: Nala
Text: Wow!

Author: Simba
Text: Shhh! Zazu.

Author: Nala
Text: Right. So how are we gonna ditch the dodo?

Author: None
Text: {Camera switch to just above Zazu. We hear the cubs whispering back and forth below}

Author: Simba
Text: Oh, I know how we can--

Author: Zazu
Text: Oh, just look at you two. Little seeds of romance blossoming in the savannah. Your parents will be thrilled... ...what with your being betrothed and all.

Author: Simba
Text: Be-what?

Author: Zazu
Text: Betrothed. Intended. Affianced.

Author: Nala
Text: Meaning...?

Author: Zazu
Text: One day, you two are going to be married!

Author: Simba
Text: Yuck! Nala: Ewww.

Author: Simba
Text: I can't marry her. She's my friend.

Author: Nala
Text: Yeah. It'd be too weird.

Author: Zazu
Text: Well, sorry to burst your bubble, but you two turtle- doves have no choice. It's a tradition...

Author: Zazu
Text: ...going back generations.

Author: Simba
Text: Well, when I'm king, that'll be the first thing to go.

Author: Zazu
Text: Not so long as I'm around.

Author: Simba
Text: Well, in that case, you're fired.

Author: Zazu
Text: Hmmm... Nice try, but only the king can do that. {Pokes Simba's nose}

Author: Nala
Text: Well, he's the future king.

Author: Simba
Text: Yeah. So you have to do what I tell you.

Author: Zazu
Text: Not yet I don't. And with an attitude like that, I'm afraid you're shaping up to be a pretty pathetic king indeed.

Author: Simba
Text: Hmph. Not the way I see it.

Author: None
Text: {Full song, colors change to wild pop-African. Background abruptly becomes surreal, brightly-colored cartoon style.}

Author: Simba
Text: I'm gonna be a mighty king So enemies beware!

Author: Zazu
Text: Well, I've never seen a king of beasts

Author: None
Text: With quite so little hair

Author: Simba
Text: I'm gonna be the mane event Like no king was before

Author: None
Text: I'm brushing up on looking down I'm working on my ROAR

Author: None
Text: {On "ROAR" he shouts at Zazu, startling him backwards into a puddle}

Author: Zazu
Text: Thus far, a rather uninspiring thing

Author: None
Text: {Camera pulls back; reveals the "towel" as the ear of a red elephant which hits Zazu with its trunk as with a golf club, sending him skipping like a stone across a shallow pool of water; the cubs follow immediately.}

Author: Simba
Text: Oh, I just can't wait to be king!

Author: Zazu
Text: You've rather a long way to go, young master, if you think...

Author: None
Text: {For this verse Zazu is making quick spoken-part replies to each line. Simba and Nala are on each side of Zazu; as he turns to talk to one, the other makes faces at him.}

Author: Simba
Text: No one saying do this

Author: Nala
Text: No one saying be there

Author: Simba
Text: No one saying stop that

Author: None
Text: Simba and Nala: No one saying see here

Author: Simba
Text: Free to run around all day

Author: Simba
Text: Free to do it all my way!

Author: Zazu
Text: {Flying ahead of the cubs, looking back to speak to them and so not paying attention ahead} I think it's time that you and I Arranged a heart to heart

Author: Simba
Text: Kings don't need advice From little hornbills for a start

Author: Zazu
Text: If this is where the monarchy is headed Count me out! Out of service, out of Africa I wouldn't hang about... aagh!

Author: None
Text: {The camera pulls back to reveal Zazu has lighted on a log being washed towards a waterfall. It disappears over the edge. Zazu yells in surprise, but quickly reappears flying towards and through the camera.}

Author: None
Text: This child is getting wildly out of wing

Author: Simba
Text: Oh, I just can't wait to be king!

Author: None
Text: {The cubs trot up a corridor of zebras standing at attention; when Zazu follows, they all turn and raise their tails; Zazu covers himself with a wing.}

Author: None
Text: {Nala and Simba dance about under a moving herd of elephants while the African flute leads a short instrumental sequence. Zazu flies overhead, looking for them. Simba ends up standing on a giraffe's head.}

Author: None
Text: Everybody look left Everybody look right

Author: None
Text: Everywhere you look I'm

Author: None
Text: Standing in the spotlight!

Author: Zazu
Text: Not yet!

Author: Chorus
Text: Let every creature go for broke and sing Let's hear it in the herd and on the wing It's gonna be King Simba's finest fling

Author: None
Text: {The Chorus of hippos, anteaters, antelopes, giraffes, etc. forms a pyramid with the cubs on top}

Author: None
Text: Simba & Chorus: Oh I just can't wait to be king! Oh I just can't wait to be king! Oh I just can't waaaaaait ... to be king!

Author: Zazu
Text: I beg your pardon, madam, but... GET OFF! ... Simba? Nala?

Author: None
Text: {Camera change to Simba and Nala making their way away from Zazu. They are laughing.}

Author: Simba
Text: All right, it worked!

Author: Nala
Text: We lost 'im.

Author: Simba
Text: I... am a genius.

Author: Nala
Text: Hey, Genius, it was my idea.

Author: Simba
Text: Yeah, but I pulled it off.

Author: Nala
Text: With me!

Author: Simba
Text: Oh yeah? ...Rrarr!

Author: None
Text: {Simba jumps at Nala; they tussle quickly. Nala ends on top and pins Simba with her forepaws, producing a resounding thump.}

Author: Nala
Text: Ha. Pinned ya.

Author: Simba
Text: Hey, lemme up.

Author: None
Text: {Nala turns away smiling. Simba looks at her and jumps at her again. They tussle, rolling down a short hill. She pins him again in the same position with another thump.}

Author: Nala
Text: Pinned ya again.

Author: None
Text: {A geyser makes a loud noise nearby, ejecting steam. The camera pulls back to a view of the surroundings that the cubs have just noticed. Mostly in grays, we see a dark craggy vale filled with skeletons of elephants. Eerie music.}

Author: Simba
Text: This is it. We made it.

Author: None
Text: {They look over the edge of the ledge they are on. A large bull elephant skull is nearby. The camera follows to survey the entire bleak view.}

Author: None
Text: Simba and Nala: Whoa!

Author: Nala
Text: It's really creepy.

Author: Simba
Text: Yeah... Isn't it great?

Author: Nala
Text: We could get in big trouble.

Author: Simba
Text: I know, huh.

Author: Nala
Text: I wonder if its brains are still in there.

Author: Simba
Text: There's only one way to know. Come on. Let's go check it out.

Author: None
Text: {Simba walks towards the mouth of the skull. Zazu flaps suddenly up in front of them, emitting a sharp squawk of "Wrong!" and giving the audience a start.}

Author: Zazu
Text: The only checking out you will do will be to check out of here.

Author: Simba
Text: Aw, man.

Author: Zazu
Text: We're way beyond the boundary of the Pride Lands.

Author: Simba
Text: Huh. Look. Banana Beak is scared. Heh.

Author: Zazu
Text: That's Mr. Banana Beak to you, fuzzy. And right now we are all in very real danger.

Author: Simba
Text: Danger? Hah! I walk on the wild side. I laugh in the face of danger. Ha ha ha ha!

Author: None
Text: {Following Simba's confident laughter we hear more laughing from inside the skull. Simba runs back and hides behind Nala and Zazu. Three hyenas emerge from the skull's eyes and mouth.}

Author: Shenzi
Text: Well, well, well, Banzai. What have we got here?

Author: Banzai
Text: Hmm. I don't know, Shenzi. Uh... what do you think, Ed?

Author: Banzai
Text: Yeah, just what I was thinking. A trio of trespassers!

Author: Zazu
Text: And quite by accident, let me assure you. A simple navigational error. Eh heh heh...

Author: Shenzi
Text: Whoa, whoa, wait wait wait... I know you. You're Mufasa's little stooge.

Author: Zazu
Text: I, madam, am the king's majordomo.

Author: Banzai
Text: And that would make you...?

Author: Simba
Text: The future king.

Author: Shenzi
Text: Do you know what we do to kings who step out of their kingdom?

Author: Simba
Text: Puh. You can't do anything to me.

Author: Zazu
Text: Uhh... technically, they can. We are on their land.

Author: Simba
Text: But Zazu, you told me they're nothing but slobbering mangy stupid poachers.

Author: Zazu
Text: Ix-nay on the oopid-stay...

Author: Banzai
Text: Who you callin' "oopid-stay?!?"

Author: Zazu
Text: My, my, my. Look at the sun. {starts to try to hasten the cubs away} It's time to go!

Author: Shenzi
Text: What's the hurry? We'd looove you to stick around for dinner.

Author: Banzai
Text: Yeaaaah! We could have whatever's... "lion" around! {In the background} Get it? Lion around!

Author: Shenzi
Text: Oh wait, wait, wait. I got one, I got one. Make mine a "cub" sandwich. Whatcha think?

Author: None
Text: {Peals of uncontrollable laughter. Ed jumps up and starts gesticulating and jabbering.}

Author: Shenzi
Text: What? Ed? What is it?

Author: Banzai
Text: Hey, did we order this dinner to go?

Author: Shenzi
Text: No. Why?

Author: Banzai
Text: 'Cause there it goes!

Author: None
Text: {Camera view to the cubs running off; they stop after a bit. Quick camera jump showing Zazu being caught in mid-flight.}

Author: Nala
Text: Did we lose 'em?

Author: Simba
Text: I think so. Where's Zazu?

Author: None
Text: {Camera switch. The hyenas have Zazu near a steam vent. Banzai is holding the bird.}

Author: Banzai
Text: The little majordomo bird hippity-hopped all the way to the birdie-boiler. {He walks Zazu to the vent and stuffs him into it, plugging it up.}

Author: Zazu
Text: Oh no. Not the birdie-boiler. {It shoots him off in a puff of steam}

Author: Simba
Text: Hey! Why don't you pick on somebody your own size?

Author: Shenzi
Text: Like... you?

Author: Simba
Text: Oops.

Author: None
Text: {The hyenas start chasing the cubs. They dart around behind them and poke their heads through an active methane vent.}

Author: None
Text: Shenzi, Banzai, Ed: BOO!

Author: None
Text: {The hyenas chase the cubs up and over the skull and the cubs slip away by sliding down the spine. They shoot off the end of the spine and land on a hillside of bones.}

Author: Nala
Text: Simba!

Author: None
Text: {Simba turns around and is horrified to see Nala slipping back down the pile.}

Author: Nala
Text: Aaaaiee!

Author: None
Text: {Simba runs bravely back and claws Shenzi across the cheek, drawing blood and distracting her while Nala escapes. Shenzi becomes enraged; the Hyenas pursue the cubs quickly and corner them in a cave.}

Author: None
Text: ************** CUT LINES ********************************* {For a reason unknown to me, the following line was cut. It appeared on story boards and even in the promotional pamphlet for the movie [as well as on the first series of collector's cards -BT]. It must have been cut fairly late in production.}

Author: Shenzi
Text: Look, boys! A king fit for a meal!

Author: Banzai
Text: Here, kitty, kitty, kitty.

Author: Shenzi
Text: Oo-hoo... that was it? Hah. Do it again... come on.

Author: None
Text: {Simba opens his mouth to roar again, but we hear a full- grown lion roar.}

Author: None
Text: Shenzi, Banzai, Ed: Huh?!

Author: None
Text: {Mufasa charges the hyenas from camera left and knocks them about until they are cringing under him.}

Author: Shenzi
Text: Oh, please, please. Uncle. Uncle. Banzai: Ow. Ow. Ow.

Author: Mufasa
Text: Silence!

Author: Banzai
Text: Oh, we're gonna shut up right now.

Author: Shenzi
Text: Calm down. We're really sorry.

Author: Mufasa
Text: If you ever come near my son again...

Author: Shenzi
Text: Oh this is... this is your son?!?

Author: Banzai
Text: Oh, your son?

Author: Shenzi
Text: Did you know that?

Author: Banzai
Text: No... me? I-I-I didn't know it. No. Did you?

Author: Shenzi
Text: No! Of course not.

Author: Banzai
Text: No.

Author: None
Text: Shenzi and Banzai: Ed?

Author: Banzai
Text: Toodles!

Author: None
Text: {With a gunshot sound they disappear. Zazu lights in front of Mufasa, giving him a "that'll show 'em" nod... but then withers under Mufasa's angry glare.}

Author: Simba
Text: Dad, I...

Author: Mufasa
Text: You deliberately disobeyed me.

Author: Simba
Text: Dad, I'm... I'm sorry.

Author: Mufasa
Text: Let's go home.

Author: None
Text: {They all start walking out of the Burial Grounds, the cubs bent down in shame.}

Author: Nala
Text: I thought you were very brave.

Author: None
Text: {The camera steadily pans up one of the walls of the cave. It stops on a horrifying image of Scar, standing on a ledge where he had been watching the cubs' near-demise.}

Author: None
Text: {Camera switch to out on the savannah. The cubs are still walking in a shamed manner behind Mufasa. Zazu is flying between.}

Author: Mufasa
Text: Zazu?

Author: Zazu
Text: {Flying forward and lighting in front of Mufasa, his trepidation showing} Yes, sire?

Author: Mufasa
Text: Take Nala home. I've got to teach my son a lesson.

Author: None
Text: {The camera views the cubs. Simba crouches lower in the grass as if to hide. Zazu flies back to the cubs.}

Author: Zazu
Text: Come, Nala. Simba... {puts his wings on Simba's shoulders, gives a heavy sigh, and then a reassuring pat} Good luck.

Author: None
Text: {Zazu and Nala leave. The camera view is of Simba in the foreground with Mufasa facing away from the camera in the background.}

Author: Mufasa
Text: Simba!

Author: None
Text: {Simba slowly turns and walks towards his father. The camera follows him forward. Ominous yet sad music. Simba steps into a depression. Looking down he sees that his forepaw fits inside just the palmprint of his father's paw. A very tense moment for Simba. It comes across to the audience that his father could easily do much, much more than discipline Simba. [It also comes across that Simba has some rather big shoes to fill, so to speak, and is only now realizing his true position. -BT] Simba is harshly reminded of how small and young he is compared to his father. He looks up and, quite courageously, continues to come forward.}

Author: None
Text: {Mufasa thinks silently for a few moments, not looking at his son. Then, finally, he turns to him.}

Author: Mufasa
Text: Simba, I'm very disappointed in you.

Author: Simba
Text: I know.

Author: Mufasa
Text: You could have been killed. You deliberately disobeyed me. And what's worse, you put Nala in danger!

Author: Simba
Text: I was just trying to be brave like you.

Author: Mufasa
Text: I'm only brave when I have to be. Simba... being brave doesn't mean you go looking for trouble.

Author: Simba
Text: But you're not scared of anything.

Author: Mufasa
Text: I was today.

Author: Simba
Text: You were?

Author: Mufasa
Text: Yes... I thought I might lose you.

Author: Simba
Text: Oh. I guess even kings get scared, huh?

Author: Mufasa
Text: Mm-hmm.

Author: Simba
Text: But you know what?

Author: Mufasa
Text: What?

Author: Simba
Text: I think those hyenas were even scareder.

Author: Mufasa
Text: 'Cause nobody messes with your dad. Come here, you.

Author: None
Text: {Mufasa has bent down. He picks Simba up and starts giving him a noogie.}

Author: Simba
Text: Oh no, no... Aaagh! Errrggh!

Author: None
Text: {Music rises as Simba and Mufasa tussle playfully for a brief while.}

Author: Simba
Text: Oh, come here... Hah! Gotcha!

Author: None
Text: {They end up with Mufasa laid down and Simba on his head}

Author: Simba
Text: Dad?

Author: Mufasa
Text: Hmm?

Author: Simba
Text: We're pals, right?

Author: Mufasa
Text: Right.

Author: Simba
Text: And we'll always be together, right?

Author: Mufasa
Text: Simba... Let me tell you something that my father told me... Look at the stars. The great kings of the past look down on us from those stars.

Author: Simba
Text: Really?

Author: Mufasa
Text: Yes... So whenever you feel alone, just remember that those kings will always be there to guide you ... And so will I.

Author: None
Text: {Camera switch from stars to Hyena cave. As we move into the cave, we first hear Banzai's voice and eventually see Banzai and Ed together with Shenzi to the side.}

Author: Banzai
Text: Man, that lousy Mufasa! I won't be able to sit for a week! {We notice numerous scratches on Banzai's rear}

Author: Banzai
Text: It's not funny, Ed.

Author: Banzai
Text: Hey, shut up!

Author: Shenzi
Text: Will you knock it off!

Author: Banzai
Text: Well, he started it!

Author: Shenzi
Text: Look at you guys. No wonder we're dangling at the bottom of the food chain.

Author: Banzai
Text: Man, I hate dangling.

Author: Shenzi
Text: Shyeah? You know, if it weren't for those lions, we'd be runnin' the joint.

Author: Banzai
Text: Yeah. Man, I hate lions.

Author: Shenzi
Text: So pushy.

Author: Banzai
Text: And hairy.

Author: Shenzi
Text: And stinky.

Author: Banzai
Text: And man, are they...

Author: None
Text: Shenzi and Banzai: UuuugLY!

Author: Scar
Text: Oh, surely we lions are not all THAT bad.

Author: Banzai
Text: Ohh. Oh, Scar, it's just you.

Author: Shenzi
Text: We were afraid it was somebody important.

Author: Banzai
Text: Yeah, you know, like Mufasa.

Author: Shenzi
Text: Yeah.

Author: Scar
Text: I see.

Author: Banzai
Text: Now that's power.

Author: Shenzi
Text: Tell me about it. I just hear that name and I shudder.

Author: Banzai
Text: Mufasa.

Author: Shenzi
Text: Ooooh. ... Do it again.

Author: Banzai
Text: Mufasa.

Author: Shenzi
Text: Ooooh!

Author: Banzai
Text: Mufasa. Mufasa! Mufasa!

Author: Shenzi
Text: ...Oooh! It tingles me.

Author: Scar
Text: I'm surrounded by idiots.

Author: Banzai
Text: Not you, Scar; I mean, you're one of us. I mean, you're our pal.

Author: Scar
Text: Charmed.

Author: Shenzi
Text: Ohh, I like that. He's not king, but he's still so proper.

Author: Banzai
Text: Yeah. Hey, hey. Did ya bring us anything to eat, Scar, old buddy, old pal? Huh? Did-ya-did-ya-did-ya?

Author: Scar
Text: I don't think you really deserve this. {Holds out a zebra haunch.} I practically gift-wrapped those cubs for you. And you couldn't even dispose of them.

Author: Shenzi
Text: Well, ya know. It wasn't exactly like they was alone, Scar.

Author: Banzai
Text: Yeah. What are we supposed to do-- kill Mufasa?

Author: Scar
Text: Precisely.

Author: None
Text: {The three hyenas pause from eating and look up at Scar questioningly.}

Author: None
Text: {Three-top flutter to coincide with Scar's leaps down to the Hyenas.}

Author: None
Text: ************** CUT LINES ********************************* {Due to plot adjustment, the intro lines to the music track Be Prepared were cut. They were originally a monologue of Scar trying to decide on using the Hyenas or not. These were cut presumably to allow for the earlier entrapment of the cubs being credited to Scar. The monologue does, however, appear on the soundtrack.}

Author: Scar
Text: I never thought hyenas essential. They're crude and unspeakably plain. But maybe they've a glimmer of potential If allied to my vision and brain.

Author: None
Text: {Scar walks calmly through sheets of flame and gas into the camera over the opening bit of the song}

Author: None
Text: {Scar paces slowly around Ed, who is chewing on the remnants of the zebra leg}

Author: None
Text: I know that your powers of retention Are as wet as a warthog's backside But thick as you are, pay attention

Author: None
Text: My words are a matter of pride

Author: None
Text: It's clear from your vacant expressions The lights are not all on upstairs

Author: None
Text: {Waving his paw in front of Ed's blank eyes to make his point; Ed's tongue lolls out}

Author: None
Text: But we're talking kings and successions Even you can't be caught unawares

Author: None
Text: {Shenzi and Banzai are laughing on a ledge behind him; on "you," Scar turns and leaps at them, throwing them backward onto a pair of geysers, which then erupt, throwing the two hyenas into the air.}

Author: None
Text: {In the next verse, Scar is strutting theatrically along a ledge which runs around back to the floor.}

Author: None
Text: So prepare for a chance of a lifetime Be prepared for sensational news A shining new era Is tiptoeing nearer

Author: Shenzi
Text: And where do we feature?

Author: Scar
Text: Just listen to teacher

Author: None
Text: I know it sounds sordid But you'll be rewarded When at last I am given my dues And injustice deliciously squared

Author: None
Text: {Scar leaps up beside Ed, who is again chewing on the bone, and here kicks him off the ledge}

Author: None
Text: Be prepared!

Author: None
Text: {The three hyenas land in a pile of bones and are submerged; they reappear, each with a different horned skull on his head.}

Author: Banzai
Text: Yeah, Be prepared. Yeah-heh... we'll be prepared, heh. ...For what?

Author: Scar
Text: For the death of the king.

Author: Banzai
Text: Why? Is he sick?

Author: Scar
Text: No, fool-- we're going to kill him. Simba too.

Author: Shenzi
Text: Great idea! Who needs a king?

Author: None
Text: Shenzi : No king! No king! la--la-la--la-laa-laa!

Author: Scar
Text: Idiots! There will be a king!

Author: Banzai
Text: Hey, but you said, uh...

Author: Scar
Text: I will be king! ...Stick with me , and you'll never go hungry again!

Author: None
Text: Shenzi and Banzai: Yaay! All right! Long live the king!

Author: None
Text: All Hyenas: Long live the king! Long live the king!

Author: None
Text: {Scar's army of hyenas is goose-stepping across the floor of the cave, now stylized into a Nazi-esque quadrangle}

Author: Hyenas
Text: It's great that we'll soon be connected. With a king who'll be all-time adored.

Author: Scar
Text: Of course, quid pro quo, you're expected To take certain duties on board

Author: None
Text: The future is littered with prizes And though I'm the main addressee The point that I must emphasize is

Author: None
Text: You won't get a sniff without me!

Author: None
Text: {Throughout the next verse, the entire horde of hyenas joins in dancing boisterously, leaping along the tops of rock pillars, shaking animal skeletons in the light, one playing a rib cage/xylophone.}

Author: None
Text: So prepare for the coup of the century Be prepared for the murkiest scam Meticulous planning Tenacity spanning Decades of denial Is simply why I'll Be king undisputed Respected, saluted And seen for the wonder I am

Author: None
Text: Yes, my teeth and ambitions are bared Be prepared!

Author: None
Text: All (Even Ed, who can be heard growling and snarling an approximation of the lines): Yes, our teeth and ambitions are bared Be prepared!

Author: None
Text: {Close with a fill-in and a fade-out. Scar and the hyenas are laughing evilly. Drum roll rises to a crash coinciding with the panoramic opening of the next scene.}

Author: None
Text: {Camera switch to a view of a large canyon. Cloud shadows scroll slowly over the landscape.}

Author: Scar
Text: Now you wait here. Your father has a marvelous surprise for you.

Author: None
Text: {Camera switch to bottom of the gully. Scar and Simba are near a rock, underneath a small tree.}

Author: Simba
Text: Oooh. What is it?

Author: Scar
Text: If I told you, it wouldn't be a surprise, now would it?

Author: Simba
Text: If you tell me, I'll still act surprised.

Author: Scar
Text: Ho ho ho. You are such a naughty boy.

Author: Simba
Text: Come on, Uncle Scar.

Author: Scar
Text: No-no-no-no-no-no-no. This is just for you and your daddy. You know, a sort of... father-son... thing.

Author: None
Text: {Through Simba's expression, we see that he resents Scar's dismissive attitude, but soon shrugs it off.}

Author: Scar
Text: Well! I'd better go get him.

Author: Simba
Text: I'll go with you.

Author: Scar
Text: No! Heh heh heh. No. Just stay on this rock. You wouldn't want to end up in another mess like you did with the hyenas...

Author: Simba
Text: You know about that?

Author: Scar
Text: Simba, everybody knows about that.

Author: Simba
Text: Really?

Author: Scar
Text: Oh, yes. Lucky Daddy was there to save you, eh? {clearly enjoying himself; he puts a paw on Simba's shoulder} Oh... and just between us, you might want to work on that little roar of yours. Hmm?

Author: Simba
Text: Oh... Okay...

Author: Simba
Text: Hey, Uncle Scar, will I like the surprise?

Author: Scar
Text: Simba, it's to DIE for.

Author: None
Text: {The camera slowly pans up the side of the gorge away from Scar and Simba. After a distance of rock, we reach the edge and view on the plain a very large herd of wildebeest; the size of the herd comes across with a striking computer-generated parallax pan. The camera then focuses in on the hyenas , who are waiting off of the edge of the herd, hidden under a rock arch.}

Author: Shenzi
Text: Shut up.

Author: Banzai
Text: I can't help it. I'm so hungry... I gotta have a wildebeest!

Author: Shenzi
Text: Stay put.

Author: Banzai
Text: Well... can't I just pick off one of the little sick ones?

Author: Shenzi
Text: No! We wait for the signal from Scar.

Author: Shenzi
Text: There he is... let's go.

Author: Simba
Text: Little roar. Puh!

Author: Simba
Text: Rarrr!

Author: None
Text: {The lizard has no reaction to this first attempt. Simba then jumps down and tries again.}

Author: Simba
Text: Rrrraowr-nh!

Author: None
Text: {For the third attempt, Simba moves closer again and inhales deeply.}

Author: Simba
Text: RAOWR!

Author: None
Text: {The lizard skitters off screen. Simba's roar echoes around the canyon. Shot of Simba lifting his ears to relish the echo. The echo is soon eclipsed, however, by a low rumble. Simba looks down and sees pebbles jumping. Cue the very sinister "To Die For" music. We see the herd coming over the lip of the gorge. Dramatic multi-layer camera pull up to Simba's terrified face. Simba takes off in front of the herd.}

Author: None
Text: {Cut to the rim of the gorge, where the Hyenas are seen chasing the wildebeest herd, nipping at their heels to drive them over the edge. Camera switch to Mufasa and Zazu a short distance from the canyon.}

Author: Zazu
Text: Oh look, sire; the herd is on the move.

Author: Mufasa
Text: Odd...

Author: Scar
Text: Mufasa. Quick. Stampede. In the gorge. Simba's down there!

Author: Mufasa
Text: Simba?

Author: None
Text: {Camera switch to Simba. He is running and climbs up a dead tree. Zazu flies ahead of Mufasa and Scar, down into the canyon. He spots Simba.}

Author: Simba
Text: Zazu! Help me!!

Author: Zazu
Text: Your father is on the way! Hold on!

Author: Simba
Text: Hurry!

Author: None
Text: {Mufasa and Scar are on the lower ledges of the gorge. Zazu flies back to Mufasa and points out where Simba is.}

Author: Zazu
Text: There! There! On that tree!

Author: Mufasa
Text: Hold on, Simba!

Author: None
Text: {In the gully, a wildebeest rams the tree Simba's on, nearly breaking it.}

Author: Simba
Text: Ahhhh!

Author: Zazu
Text: Oh Scar, this is awful. What will we do? What will we do? Hah ... I'll go back for help, that's what I'll do, I'll go back for he--oomph!

Author: None
Text: {Scar backhands Zazu into a rock wall, knocking him out. Scar then follows Mufasa's progress from the lip of the gorge, his shadow cast mysteriously from the bottom of the gully . Mufasa runs with the herd till slightly past the tree. He whips around the front of some wildebeest and runs into the herd towards Simba's tree. He gets rammed head-first once, throwing him to the ground. A wildebeest hits Simba's tree, throwing Simba into the air. Mufasa gets up in time to catch Simba in the air with his mouth. He gets hit again and accidentally throws Simba. Simba dodges a few oncoming wildebeest. Mufasa runs by with the herd and grabs Simba. He jumps up to a near rock ledge and sets Simba down, but is immediately struck by a wildebeest and carried off into the stampede.}

Author: Simba
Text: DAD!

Author: None
Text: {Simba watches in horror as he cannot find his father in the swirling mass of wildebeest below him. At the last second, Mufasa leaps out of the herd and starts to climb with great difficulty up the sheer rock slope. Simba turns and starts to climb up to the top of the gorge. Out of Simba's sight, Mufasa reaches a point right below a ledge where he can't climb due to the steepness. His claws are scraping and his back paws have no traction. Above him on the ledge is Scar.}

Author: Mufasa
Text: Scar! Broth-- Brother! Help me!

Author: None
Text: {Scar looks disdainfully down, and then suddenly latches onto Mufasa's forepaws with claws extended. Mufasa roars, primarily from the sudden pain of Scar's claws, but no doubt also due to the sudden flash of realization. His expression slowly changes to one of horror as he recognizes Scar's intent.}

Author: Scar
Text: Long live the king.

Author: None
Text: {Scar throws his brother backwards. Mufasa free-falls, back first. The camera follows Mufasa down from under him, then from above him, showing the stampede raging below.}

Author: Mufasa
Text: Aaaaaaahh!

Author: None
Text: {Camera suddenly focuses in on Simba, who is watching his father hit the ground. No sound effects of the hit. No view of it either. Mufasa and Simba's screams mingle.}

Author: Simba
Text: Nooooooo!

Author: None
Text: {The herd passes. Everything is clouded by dust. Simba bounds to the canyon floor. Mufasa is nowhere to be seen.}

Author: Simba
Text: Dad!!

Author: Simba
Text: Dad?

Author: None
Text: {We see a stray wildebeest run past, the source of the sound. The wildebeest curves around a log further down the gully. Under the log is Mufasa, laying on his side. He is not moving or breathing. Simba approaches the body. Sad musical theme. Again we notice how small Simba really is.}

Author: Simba
Text: Dad? ...Dad, come on. {He rubs up against Mufasa's cheek. The head merely rolls back in place after the rub} You gotta get up. {He places both forepaws on his father's cheek and pushes} Dad. We gotta go home. {He tugs at Mufasa's ear. Again the head limply moves back in place. Simba runs off a bit, obviously very scared.} HEEEEELP! Somebody! {His voice reverberates hollowly off the sides of the gorge.} Anybody... help.

Author: None
Text: {He cries. Simba turns back to the body. He nuzzles up under the limp paw so that his father is embracing him. Pause for effect.}

Author: None
Text: {Where the music would resolve, we hit a minor chord as the image of Scar advancing appears through the dust.}

Author: Scar
Text: Simba. ...What have you done?

Author: Simba
Text: There were wildebeests and he tried to save me... it was an accident, I... I didn't mean for it to happen.

Author: Scar
Text: Of course, of course you didn't. No one... ever means {pulls Simba closer; Simba hides his face on Scar's foreleg} for these things to happen. ...But the king IS dead. {looking with mock regret at Simba) And if it weren't for you, he'd still be alive. {Simba is crushed, believing his guilt. Another thought "occurs" to Scar.} Oh! What will your mother think?

Author: Simba
Text: What am I gonna do?

Author: Scar
Text: Run away, Simba. Run... Run away and never return.

Author: None
Text: {Simba runs off blindly, obviously broken. Slight pause, for the audience to catch its emotional breath. Music ends. The three hyenas appear behind Scar.}

Author: Scar
Text: Kill him.

Author: None
Text: {The hyenas take off after him; Scar stands motionless. Simba is chased up the entire length of the gully. He reaches the lip only to see a sheer drop on the other side. Having no choice he jumps and tumbles down into a patch of briars below. The hyenas pursue the entire way. When the are running down towards the briars, Banzai sees them and recoils.

Author: Banzai
Text: Whoa!!

Author: None
Text: {After skidding extensively, Banzai manages to stop just above the brambles. He heaves a sigh of relief. Then Shenzi and Ed run into him, propelling him into the bushes.}

Author: Banzai
Text: Yeow!

Author: Shenzi
Text: {Seeing Simba emerge from the far side of the briars into the desert} Hey-- There he goes! There he goes!

Author: Banzai
Text: So go get 'im.

Author: Shenzi
Text: There ain't no way I'm going in there. What, you want me to come out there looking like you? Cactus Butt?

Author: Banzai
Text: {Spitting out thorns into Ed's laughing face; Ed lets out a small yelp of pain} We gotta finish the job.

Author: Shenzi
Text: Well, he's as good as dead out there anyway. And IF he comes back, we'll kill him.

Author: Banzai
Text: Yeah! you hear that? If you ever come back, we'll kill ya!!!

Author: None
Text: {"Kill ya" echoes off as we see Simba still running into the desert. The Hyenas make their way off the cliffs back to the Pride Lands.}

Author: None
Text: {Camera change to Scar addressing the lionesses by the moon on Pride Rock.}

Author: Scar
Text: Mufasa's death was a terrible tragedy; but to lose Simba, who had barely begun to live...

Author: None
Text: {Camera pans around the lionesses. Some of them, with Zazu, are comforting Sarabi, who bends her head in extreme pain. Nala is rubbing against her mother's paw, crying.}

Author: Scar
Text: ...For me it is a deep personal loss. So it is with a heavy heart that I assume the throne. Yet, out of the ashes of this tragedy, we shall rise to greet the dawning of a new era... {The hyenas start emerging, casting eerie green shadows and laughing hollowly} ...in which lion and hyena come together, in a great and glorious future! {Scar ascends Pride Rock as the hyenas appear in full force.}

Author: None
Text: {The camera pans to Rafiki who is shaking his head in the distance. The scene changes with Rafiki in the same position. He is in his tree house. After wiping away a tear, he reaches up and rubs his hand across the cub painting, smearing it. The camera changes. The painting, smeared, is overlaid on Simba laying out in the hot desert sun.}

Author: None
Text: {Buzzards are circling the cub's body. One descends, then all. They circle around it. With a blast of music, Timon riding Pumbaa appears and dives into the midst of the buzzards. They slap and kick the buzzards all away.}

Author: Timon
Text: Yeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeaaaahh! Get out! Get out! Get outta here! Whoo!

Author: Pumbaa
Text: I love it! Bowling for buzzards!

Author: Timon
Text: Gets 'em every time.

Author: Pumbaa
Text: Uh-oh. Hey Timon. You better come look. I think it's still alive.

Author: Timon
Text: Ewww...

Author: None
Text: {Timon walks to the front of Simba. He is lying with his paw over his face.}

Author: Timon
Text: All righty, what have we got here? {he smells Simba}

Author: None
Text: {He tries to lift Simba's paw. He can't. He gets under it and with a great push gets it above his head. He sees Simba's face.}

Author: Timon
Text: Jeez, it's a lion! Run, Pumbaa! Move it!

Author: Pumbaa
Text: Hey, Timon. It's just a little lion. Look at him. He's so cute, and all alone! Can we keep him?

Author: Timon
Text: {Yelling into Pumbaa's ear, which creates a reverberating effect} Pumbaa, are you nuts? We're talking about a lion. Lions eat guys like us.

Author: Pumbaa
Text: But he's so little.

Author: None
Text: {He leans over to regard Simba, and accidentally dumps Timon from his head.}

Author: Timon
Text: He's gonna get bigger.

Author: Pumbaa
Text: {Seen from Timon's point of view on the ground, with a huge nose) Maybe he'll be on our side.

Author: Timon
Text: A--huh! That's the stupidest thing I ever heard. Maybe he'll b-- ...Hey, I got it! What if he's on our side? You know, having a lion around might not be such a bad idea.

Author: Pumbaa
Text: So we keeping 'im?

Author: Timon
Text: Of course. Who's the brains in this outfit?

Author: Pumbaa
Text: Uhhh...

Author: Timon
Text: My point exactly. Jeez, I'm fried. Let's get out of here and find some shade.

Author: None
Text: {Camera switch to Pumbaa, Timon, and Simba near a pool of water and oasis. Simba has been laid near the water. Timon splashes some water in Simba's face. Simba stirs.}

Author: Timon
Text: You okay, kid?

Author: Simba
Text: I guess so.

Author: Pumbaa

Author: Timon
Text: Good. We don't wanna hear about it.

Author: Simba
Text: Not unless you can change the past.

Author: Pumbaa
Text: You know, kid, in times like this my buddy Timon here says, "You got to put your behind in your past..."

Author: Timon
Text: No. No. No.

Author: Pumbaa

Author: Timon
Text: Amateur. Lie down before you hurt yourself. It's "You got to put your past behind you." Look, kid. Bad things happen, and you can't do anything about it, right?

Author: Simba
Text: Right.

Author: Timon
Text: Wrong! When the world turns its back on you, you turn your back on the world.

Author: Simba

Author: Timon
Text: Then maybe you need a new lesson. Repeat after me. Hakuna Matata.

Text: You know, kid-- These two words will solve all your problems.

Text: {Timon pulls back a fern leaf, revealing a beautiful view of a rift-jungle. Waterfalls and rugged terrain make a beautiful view. Harp runs accentuate the scene.}

Author: Timon
Text: Welcome... to our humble home.

Author: Simba
Text: You live here?

Text: We live wherever we want.

Text: Yep. Home is where your rump rests. Heh!

Text: I'm starved.

Text: Eeeahhah. We're fresh out of zebra.

Author: Timon

Text: Nope. Listen, kid; if you live with us, you have to eat like us. Hey, this looks like a good spot to rustle up some grub.

Text: {Timon has stopped in front of a log. Pumbaa forces it up with his snout, revealing many insects. Timon picks one up.}

Author: Pumbaa
Text: You'll learn to love 'em.

Author: Timon
Text: I'm telling you, kid, this is the great life. No rules. No responsibilities. {pokes his hand into a knothole-- many bugs scramble out} Oooh! The little cream-filled kind. And best of all, no worries.

Text: {Timon has been collecting bugs on a leaf. He offers it to Simba. Simba picks out a grub.}

Author: Timon
Text: Well, kid?

Author: Simba
Text: Oh well-- Hakuna Matata.

Author: Simba
Text: Slimy, yet satisfying.

Author: None
Text: {The camera switches to a view of the jungle. We hear a monstrous belch reverberate across the landscape. The camera switches to Timon, Pumbaa, and Simba lying on their backs looking at the stars.}

Text: Whoah. Nice one, Simba.

Text: Me too. I ate like a pig.

Text: Pumbaa-- you are a pig.

Text: Oh. Right.

Text: Timon?

Text: Yeah?

Text: Ever wonder what those sparkly dots are up there?

Author: Timon
Text: Pumbaa. I don't wonder; I know.

Author: Pumbaa
Text: Oh. What are they?

Author: Timon
Text: They're fireflies. Fireflies that uh... got stuck up in that big... bluish-black... thing.

Text: Oh. Gee. I always thought that they were balls of gas burning billions of miles away.

Author: Timon
Text: Pumbaa, wit' you, everything's gas.

Author: Pumbaa
Text: Simba, what do you think?

Author: Simba
Text: Well, I don't know...

Author: Pumbaa
Text: Aw come on. Give, give, give .. Well, come on, Simba, we told you ours... pleeeease? Timon: Come on, come on... give, give..

Text: Well, somebody once told me that the great kings of the past are up there, watching over us.

Text: Really?

Text: You mean a bunch of royal dead guys are watching us? Pbbb.

Text: {The music continues. Simba walks out on a ledge and looks up at the stars. He then collapses to lay on the edge of the ledge. Milkweed floss is stirred into the air by his flop. Author: Timon
Text: Huh?

Text: {Timon gets up on the branch and sees the lioness charging at full speed towards them. He gets down and tries to help push Pumbaa out from under the root.}

Text: Woah! ... Jeez! Why do I always have to save your AAAAAA!

Text: Don't worry, buddy. I'm here for ya. Everything's gonna be okay. Get her! Bite her head! Go for the jugular. The jugular! See, I told you he'd come in handy.

Text: But with power!

Text: Could you guys... excuse us for a few minutes?

Text: Hey, whatever she has to say, she can say in front of us. Right, Simba?

Text: Hmm. Maybe you'd better go.

Text: It starts. You think you know a guy...

Author: Simba

Text: What? ...What is it?

Text: I've really missed you.

Text: What wouldn't I understand?

Text: Simba!

Text: I would if you would just tell me!

Text: Forget it!

Text: Fine!

Author: Simba
Text: I hate to tell you this, but... he died. A long time ago.

Author: Rafiki
Text: Nope. Wrong again! Ha ha hah! He's alive! And I'll show him to you. You follow old Rafiki, he knows the way. Come on!

Author: None
Text: {Rafiki leads Simba through the brush. Simba has trouble keeping up due to his size. The music slips into African chant.}

Author: Rafiki
Text: Don't dawdle. Hurry up!

Author: Simba
Text: Hey, whoa. Wait, wait.

Author: Rafiki
Text: Come on, come on.

Author: Simba
Text: Would you slow down?

Author: None
Text: {Rafiki is seen flitting through the canopy ahead of Simba, laughing hollowly and whooping. Simba struggles to keep up. Suddenly, Rafiki appears with his hand held up right into Simba's face.}

Author: Rafiki
Text: STOP!

Author: None
Text: Shhh.

Author: None
Text: Look down there.

Author: None
Text: {Simba quietly and carefully works his way out. He looks over the edge and sees his reflection in a pool of water He first seems a bit startled, perhaps at his own mature appearance, but then realizes what he's looking at.}

Author: Simba
Text: That's not my father. That's just my reflection.

Author: Rafiki
Text: Noo. Look harder.

Author: None
Text: {Rafiki motions over the pool. Ripples form, distorting Simba's reflection; they resolve into Mufasa's face. A deep rumbling noise is heard.

Author: None
Text: You see, he lives in you.

Author: None
Text: {Simba is awestruck. The wind picks up. In the air the huge image of Mufasa is forming from the clouds. He appears to be walking from the stars. The image is ghostly at first, but steadily gains color and coherence.}

Author: Mufasa
Text: Simba . . .

Author: Simba
Text: Father?

Author: Mufasa
Text: Simba, you have forgotten me.

Author: Simba
Text: No. How could I?

Author: Mufasa
Text: You have forgotten who you are, and so have forgotten me. Look inside yourself, Simba. You are more than what you have become. You must take your place in the Circle of Life.

Author: Simba
Text: How can I go back? I'm not who I used to be.

Author: None
Text: {Shot of cloud-Mufasa, with glowing yellow eyes. He is framed in swirling clouds, radiating golden light.}

Author: Mufasa
Text: Remember who you are. You are my son, and the one true king.

Author: None
Text: {Close up of Simba's face, bathed in the golden light, showing a mixture of awe, fear, and sadness. The image of Mufasa starts to fade.}

Author: None
Text: Remember who you are.

Author: None
Text: {Mufasa is disappearing rapidly into clouds. Simba runs into the fields trying to keep up with the image.}

Author: Simba
Text: No. Please! Don't leave me. Mufasa: Remember... Simba: Father! Mufasa: Remember... Simba: Don't leave me. Mufasa: Remember . . .

Author: None
Text: {Simba is left out in the fields. There is just a cloud left where his father's image was. The wind tosses the grass restlessly. Rafiki approaches.}

Author: Rafiki
Text: What was THAT? The weather-- Pbbbah! Very peculiar. Don't you think?

Author: Simba
Text: Yeah. Looks like the winds are changing.

Author: Rafiki
Text: Ahhh. Change is good.

Author: Simba
Text: Yeah, but it's not easy. I know what I have to do. But, going back means I'll have to face my past. I've been running from it for so long.

Author: None
Text: Oww! Jeez-- What was that for?

Author: Rafiki
Text: It doesn't matter; it's in the past!

Author: Simba
Text: Yeah, but it still hurts.

Author: Rafiki
Text: Oh yes, the past can hurt. But the way I see it, you can either run from it, or... learn from it.

Author: None
Text: {He swings at Simba with his staff again. This time Simba ducks.}

Author: None
Text: Hah, you see! So what are you going to do?

Author: Simba
Text: First, I'm gonna take your stick.

Author: Rafiki
Text: No, no, no, no! Not the stick!

Author: None
Text: Hey, where are you going?

Author: Simba
Text: I'm going back!

Author: Rafiki
Text: Good! Go on! Get out of here! {laughs, hoots, n' hollers. As he holds his staff above his head, a few shooting stars zing across the sky. Music rises into celebratory "Busa" theme:}

Author: BS
Text: Busa le lizwe Busa le lizwe Busa le lizwe Busa lomhlaba

Author: None
Text: Sabusa le lizwe Sabusa le lizwe Sabusa le lizwe Busa lomhlaba

Author: None
Text: {Camera switch to Timon and Pumbaa sleeping. Timon is curled up on Pumbaa; Pumbaa is lying on his back. Both are snoring. In his snore, Pumbaa occasionally mumbles "Grubs, grubs." Nala approaches and taps Timon with a paw.}

Author: Nala
Text: Hey. Hey, wake up.

Author: None
Text: {Timon wakes up and see a huge lion face in his view. He starts screaming and Pumbaa joins in.}

Author: Nala
Text: It's OK. Whoa, whoa. It's OK. It's ME.

Author: Timon
Text: Don't ever do that again! Carnivores, oy!

Author: Nala
Text: Have you guys seen Simba?

Author: Timon
Text: I thought he was with you.

Author: Nala
Text: He was, but now I can't find him. Where is he?

Author: Rafiki
Text: Ho, ho, ho, ho. You won't find him here. Ha ha. The king... has returned.

Author: Nala
Text: I can't believe it. He's gone back.

Author: Timon
Text: Gone back? What do you mean? {Looks where Rafiki was; Rafiki is now gone} Hey! What's goin' on here? Who's the monkey?

Author: Nala
Text: Simba's gone to challenge Scar.

Author: Timon
Text: Who?

Author: Nala
Text: Scar.

Author: Pumbaa
Text: Who's got a scar?

Author: Nala
Text: No, no, no. It's his uncle.

Author: Timon
Text: The monkey's his uncle?

Author: Nala
Text: No! Simba's gone back to challenge his uncle to take his place as king.

Author: None
Text: Timon and Pumbaa: Ohhh.

Author: None
Text: {With accompanying music , we see a far shot of Simba charging full speed across the desert. A layover is faded in of Simba's feet pounding the sand.}

Author: None
Text: {Simba slowly crosses the desolated land. He reaches the lip of a cliff and looks out over his former home. Mostly lacking in life, it is painted in grays. Seeing the desolation, a look of determination, even fury, appears on Simba's face.}

Author: Nala
Text: Simba, wait up! ...It's awful, isn't it?

Author: Simba
Text: I didn't want to believe you.

Author: Nala
Text: What made you come back?

Author: Simba
Text: I finally got some sense knocked into me. And I've got the bump to prove it. Besides, this is my kingdom. If I don't fight for it, who will?

Author: Nala
Text: I will.

Author: Simba
Text: It's gonna be dangerous.

Author: Nala
Text: Danger? Ha! I laugh in the face of danger. Ha ha ha ha.

Author: Timon
Text: I see nothing funny about this.

Author: Simba
Text: Timon? Pumbaa? What are you doing here?

Author: Pumbaa
Text: At your service, my liege.

Author: Timon
Text: Uh. We're going to fight your uncle... for this?

Author: Simba
Text: Yes, Timon; this is my home.

Author: Timon
Text: Ffh. Talk about your fixer-upper. Well, Simba, if it's important to you, we're with you to the end.

Author: None
Text: {Simba smiles appreciatively. Nice scene with the four of them on the ledge viewing the work ahead of them.}

Author: None
Text: {Camera switches to Simba. Nala, Timon, and Pumbaa sneaking up to the edge of Pride Rock. From behind a log, they observe close up the hordes of hyenas.}

Author: Timon
Text: Hyenas. I hate hyenas. So what's your plan for gettin' past those guys?

Author: Simba
Text: Live bait.

Author: Timon
Text: Good idea. Heeey.

Author: Simba
Text: Come on, Timon-- you guys have to create a diversion.

Author: Timon
Text: What do you want me to do? Dress in drag and do the hula?

Author: None
Text: {Camera switch to Timon in a hula outfit. The music sung is The Hawaiian War Chant much like the Spike Jones arrangement. Pumbaa is set up like a roast pig, even with an apple in his mouth. Jungle drum riff.}

Author: None
Text: Luau!

Author: None
Text: If you're hungry for a hunk of fat and juicy meat Eat my buddy Pumbaa here because he is a treat

Author: None
Text: Come on down and dine On this tasty swine All you have to do is get in line

Author: None
Text: Aaaare you achin' Foooor some bacon? Heeee's a big pig You could be a big pig too.

Author: None
Text: Oy!

Author: None
Text: {The run off screaming to lead some of the hyenas away. Simba and Nala make it by.}

Author: Simba
Text: Nala, you find my mother and rally the lionesses. I'll look for Scar.

Author: None
Text: {Simba is making his way up Pride Rock. Scar calling his mother causes him to pause and watch.}

Author: Scar
Text: SARABI!

Author: None
Text: {Sarabi ascends Pride Rock. The hyenas snap at her heels. She only glares disdainfully at them.}

Author: Sarabi
Text: Yes, Scar?

Author: Scar
Text: Where is your hunting party? They're not doing their job.

Author: Sarabi
Text: Scar, there is no food. The herds have moved on.

Author: Scar
Text: No. You're just not looking hard enough.

Author: Sarabi
Text: It's over. There is nothing left. We have only one choice. We must leave Pride Rock.

Author: Scar
Text: We're not going anywhere.

Author: Sarabi
Text: Then you have sentenced us to death.

Author: Scar
Text: Then so be it.

Author: Sarabi
Text: You can't do that.

Author: Scar
Text: I'm the king. I can do whatever I want.

Author: Sarabi
Text: If you were half the king Mufasa was you would nev--

Author: Scar
Text: I'm ten times the king Mufasa was!

Author: None
Text: {Simba appears on the ledge, growling loudly. He leaps out and runs to his mother. Scar mistakes Simba as Mufasa and is understandably frightened.}

Author: None
Text: Mufasa? No. You're dead.

Author: None
Text: {Sarabi awakens at her son's nudge, but mistakes him as Mufasa as Scar did.}

Author: Sarabi
Text: Mufasa?

Author: Simba
Text: No. It's me.

Author: Sarabi
Text: Simba? You're alive? How can that be?

Author: Simba
Text: It doesn't matter; I'm home.

Author: Scar
Text: Simba...? Simba! I'm a little surprised to see you, {giving the hyenas above him an angry look} alive...

Author: None
Text: {On the word "alive," Shenzi, Banzai, and Ed gulp audibly and slink into the shadows.}

Author: Simba
Text: Give me one good reason why I shouldn't rip you apart.

Author: Scar
Text: Oh, Simba, you must understand. The pressures of ruling a kingdom...

Author: Simba
Text: ...Are no longer yours. Step down, Scar.

Author: Scar
Text: Oh, oh, ye-- Well, I would, heh, naturally, heh-- however, there is one little problem. You see them? They think I'M king.

Author: Nala
Text: Well, we don't. Simba is the rightful king.

Author: Simba
Text: The choice is yours, Scar. Either step down or fight.

Author: Scar
Text: Oh, must it all end in violence? I'd hate to be responsible for the death of a family member. Wouldn't you agree, Simba?

Author: Simba
Text: That's not gonna work, Scar. I've put it behind me.

Author: Scar
Text: Eh, but what about your faithful subjects? Have they put it behind them?

Author: Nala
Text: Simba, what is he talking about?

Author: Scar
Text: Ahh, so you haven't told them your little secret. Well, Simba, now's your chance to tell them. Tell them who is responsible for Mufasa's death!

Author: None
Text: {Scar's last line causes the lionesses to start. All are concentrating on Simba.}

Author: Simba
Text: I am.

Author: Sarabi
Text: It's not true. Tell me it's not true.

Author: Simba
Text: It's true.

Author: Scar
Text: You see! He admits it! Murderer!

Author: Simba
Text: No. It was an accident.

Author: None
Text: {Scar walks around and around Simba as he accuses him; very nicely done animated rotation.}

Author: Scar
Text: If it weren't for you, Mufasa would still be alive. It's your fault he's dead; do you deny it?

Author: Simba
Text: No.

Author: Scar
Text: Then... you're... guilty.

Author: Simba
Text: No. I'm not a murderer.

Author: Scar
Text: Oh, Simba, you're in trouble again. But this time, Daddy isn't here to save you. And now EVERYONE.. KNOWS... WHY!

Author: None
Text: {Scar has been backing Simba up the length of Pride Rock. After his last sentence, Simba slips over the edge and is clinging to the ledge by his forepaws. Lightning strikes below, igniting a fire.}

Author: Nala
Text: Simba!

Author: Scar
Text: Now this looks familiar. Hmm. Where have I seen this before? Let me think. Hmmm... hmmm. Oh yes, I remember. This is just the way your father looked before he died.

Author: None
Text: {Scar grabs Simba with his claws as he did Mufasa. He whispers into Simba's ear.}

Author: None
Text: And here's MY little secret: I killed Mufasa.

Author: None
Text: {Simba has a quick memory flash back to that fateful instant. His voice blends with his younger voice in the scream of when his father died. In one giant leap he lunges up and pins Scar on his back. Scar is caught completely by surprise and is understandably very nervous and shaken.}

Author: Simba
Text: NoooooOOOO! ...Murderer!

Author: Scar
Text: No, Simba, please.

Author: Simba
Text: Tell them the truth.

Author: Scar
Text: Truth? But truth is in the eye of the beholdllgkkk!

Author: None
Text: All right. All right. I did it.

Author: Simba
Text: So they can hear you.

Author: Scar
Text: I killed Mufasa!

Author: None
Text: {Nala starts towards Scar, the hyenas attack Simba in a wall of teeth. The lionesses join in. We see Pumbaa and Timon come in. Pumbaa is charging with Timon riding him. Hyenas are flying everywhere.}

Author: Pumbaa
Text: Heeeyyyy-yaaaaah! Timon: 'Scuse me. Pardon me. Comin' through. Hot stuff. Whoo!

Author: None
Text: {Bowling strike sound effect as hyenas fly. Rafiki whacks a hyena off Simba. Camera switch to him; with a battle scream, he joins the fray. As a bit of comic relief, Rafiki is fighting in kung-fu "B-movie" style, complete with cheesy sound effects.}

Author: Rafiki
Text: WwwA! Hozah! Hazoww! Yaa! Yah! hhyEEOOWww!

Author: None
Text: {Camera switch to Timon running from Shenzi. He runs into the cave. Zazu spots him. Timon runs into his cage for safety from the hyenas.}

Author: Zazu
Text: Let me out! Let me out!

Author: Timon
Text: Let me in! Let me in! ...Ple-he-hease don't eat me.

Author: Pumbaa
Text: Problem?

Author: Banzai
Text: Hey, who's the pig?

Author: Pumbaa
Text: Are you talking to me?

Author: Timon
Text: Uh oh. They called him a pig.

Author: Pumbaa
Text: Are you talking to me?!

Author: Timon
Text: Shouldn't 'a done that.

Author: Pumbaa
Text: ARE YOU TALKING TO ME?!?

Author: Timon
Text: Now they're in for it.

Author: Pumbaa
Text: They CALL me... MIIISTER PIG! AAAAAHHH...

Author: Timon
Text: Take that! And that! Banzai: Ow ow ow ow ow ow ow ... Pumbaa: Take that! And that! You yellow belly... Zazu: Take that, you stupid...

Author: None
Text: {They start the Arsenio Hall "Ooh, ooh" chant. The scene switches to Simba chasing Scar up to the high point of Pride Rock. Scar runs up to the edge and sees the sheer drop. Simba leaps up to confront him at the cliff-like edge. Scar is very apprehensive, seeing he is cornered and at Simba's mercy.}

Author: Simba
Text: Murderer.

Author: Scar
Text: Simba, Simba. Please. Please have mercy. I beg you.

Author: Simba
Text: You don't deserve to live.

Author: Scar
Text: But, Simba, I am... ah... family. It's the hyenas who are the real enemy. It was their fault-- it was their idea!

Author: None
Text: {Shenzi, Banzai, and Ed are in the background. They overhear and back away growling at Scar's betrayal.}

Author: Simba
Text: Why should I believe you? Everything you ever told me was a lie.

Author: Scar
Text: What are you going to do? You wouldn't kill your old Uncle...?

Author: Simba
Text: No, Scar. I'm not like you.

Author: Scar
Text: Oh, Simba, thank you. You are truly noble. I'll make it up to you, I promise. How can I, ah, prove myself to you? Tell me; I mean, anything.

Author: Simba
Text: Run. Run away, Scar. And never return.

Author: Scar
Text: Yes. Of course. As you wish... {looking down and seeing a pile of hot coals} ...your Majesty! {Scar swipes the coals into Simba's face. With a cry of surprise and pain, Simba paws the coals away as Scar leaps and attacks.}

Author: None
Text: {There is a fight in slow motion. Both Scar and Simba land heavy blows. Simba gets knocked on his back. Scar leaps through the flames at him. Simba gathers courage and uses Scar's momentum in a "throw" similar to Nala's fighting tactics to send him flying over the edge. Scar tumbles to the bottom. He weakly gets up. He sees Banzai, Shenzi, and Ed approaching and smiles. Ed has a very angry look on his face.}

Author: Scar
Text: Ahh, my friends.

Author: Shenzi
Text: Frie-he-hends? I thought he said we were the enemy!

Author: Banzai
Text: Yeah, that's what I heard.

Author: None
Text: Banzai and Shenzi: Ed?

Author: Scar
Text: No. L-L-L-Le-Le-Le-Le-Let me explain. No. You don't understand. No! I didn't mean for... No, No! Look, I m sorry I called you... No! NOO!

Author: None
Text: {The camera moves away and we can only see the shadows as the horde of hyenas closes on and devours Scar. Rain opens up and douses the fire. Simba comes down and greets his mother and Nala. Rafiki motions for Simba to ascend Pride Rock as king. Simba starts up and pauses to hug Rafiki as his father did.}

Author: Rafiki
Text: It is time.

Author: None
Text: {Very majestically, he ascends through the rain. Music is strong. Through a hole in the clouds we can see a patch of stars. One bright star shines out briefly.}

Author: Mufasa
Text: Remember . . .

Author: None
Text: {Simba's expression gains confidence and strength. He roars. The lionesses roar in reply. Time switch to the savannah in full bloom again. Cue "Busa" theme:}

Author: BS
Text: Busa le lizwe Busa le lizwe Busa le lizwe Bus-busa ngo xolo

Author: MS
Text: Se-fi-le Baba ti-tabo Maye babo Busa lomhlaba

Author: BS
Text: MS: He! Se-fi-le Busa Simba! Busa Simba!

Author: None
Text: Ubuse ngo xolo Ubuse ngo thando Ubuse ngo xolo Ubuse ngo thando

Author: None
Text: Ubuse ngo xolo

Author: None
Text: {Simba, Timon, Pumbaa, and Nala are on Pride Rock. Zazu flies up to the point. Timon, of course, is shaking his arms in the classic victory sign. All the groups of herds are there and making noise as in the presentation of Simba.}

Author: BS
Text: Ingonyama nengw' enamabala Ingonyama nengw' enamabala MS:

Author: None
Text: Full Chorus: Till we find our place On the path unwinding In the Circle The Circle of Life

Author: None
Text: Circle of... Liiife

Author: None
Text: {Rafiki appears, holding Kiara. He lifts her to present her to the crowd. Bass drum hit and black out to title in red lettering as in the beginning. The Circle is completed.}
